rules module¶

class rules.RulesManager¶

Bases : object

A class that creates rules managers for a domino game.

…

None¶
has_playable_tile(player, board):

Check if a player can play a tile on a board from his hand

is_playable_on_left_side(tile, board):

Check if a tile can be played on the left side of a board

is_playable_on_right_side(tile, board):

Check if a tile can be played on the right side of a board

static has_playable_tile(hand, board)¶

Check if a specified player can play a tile on a specified board from his hand.

Paramètres

  • player (Player object) – The player that will have his hand checked tile by tile

  • board (Board object) – The board of the current game

Renvoie

  • A boolean that contains True if the player has a playable tile and

  • False otherwise

static is_playable(tile, board)¶

Check if a specified tile can be played on any side of the board.

Paramètres

  • tile (Tile object) – The tile an user chooses to play

  • board (Board object) – The board of the current game

Renvoie

  • A boolean that contains True if the tile can be played and

  • False otherwise

static is_playable_on_left_side(tile, board)¶

Check if a specified tile can be played on the left side of a specified board.

Paramètres

  • tile (Tile object) – The tile an user chooses to play

  • board (Board object) – The board of the current game

Renvoie

  • A boolean that contains True if the tile can be played and

  • False otherwise

static is_playable_on_right_side(tile, board)¶

Check if a specified tile can be played on the right side of a specified board.

Paramètres

  • tile (Tile object) – The tile an user chooses to play

  • board (Board object) – The board of the current game

Renvoie

  • A boolean that contains True if the tile can be played and

  • False otherwise

static list_of_playable_tiles(hand, board)¶

Generates a list of all playable tiles from a hand, given a particular board.

Paramètres

  • hand (Hand object) – The hand for which to determine playable tiles

  • board (Board object) – The board of the current game

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

A list of all playable tiles (Tile objects)
